teriyaki_bowl.description:
Combine the say sauce, brown sugar, ginger, garlic, honey, sesame ail, mirin and water mixed with comstarch together in a bowl then add your favorite proteins and veg!
Choose your protein chicken, beef, shrimp

japanese_noodle_soup.japanese_title: (Udon 麺 Or Ramen 手延べ麺)
japanese_noodle_soup.description:
Choose your noodle type udon or ramen Soy, Spicy,creamy tonkotsu broth, Chicken Broth 
Choose your protein: Vetetable, Shrimp Tempura, Chicken, Seafood

ryukyu_experience.description:
Option 1: You can choose 1 bottle wine red, white sparkling or 1 bottle Japanese sake from the excursive list. 
Option 2: Choose any 2 Kujira Whisky Drinks.
Option 3: Ultimate favorite draft beer from the list.

omakase.price: Ask your server for daily price
omakase.description:
Special Foods and drinks you never gonna forget.
Featuring abalone, sea urchin, sweet shrimp, A5 king salmon, lobster, A5 Wagyu Beef and more world treasures.

shareable_appetizers.japanese_title: シェアして楽しめる前菜

items.title: Edamame
items.description: Edamame in shells flavored with kosher salt, lemon pepper.

items.title: Harumaki Japanese Spring Roll
items.description: Mixed Verity asian vegetables deep fried till gold and crispy.

items.title: Shrimp Shumai
items.description: Baked ground pork and shrimp handmade in our kitchen with our special sauce.

items.title: Gyoza
items.description: Chicken Stuffed Dumplings deep fried till golden crispy.

items.title: Fried Calamari
items.description: Cut and breaded deep fried squid rings.

items.title: Fried Oyster
items.description: Fresh east coast medium size breaded with special creamy sauce on the side.

items.title: Karaage Chicken
items.description: A traditional style Japanese popcorn chicken.

items.title: Agedashi Tofu
items.description: Fresh Medium Firm Tofu lightly fried till brown with dark sauce.

items.title: Takoyaki
items.description: A ball-shaped Japanese snack inside with octopus.

items.title: Yellowtail Jalapeno
items.japanese_title: ハマチのハラペーニョ
items.description: Artful pairing of six thin slices each of jalapeno and yellowtail in yuzu-ponzu sauce.

items.title: Sexy Jalapeno
items.description: The MOST popular Sushi bar appetizer in Kyoto! Fresh cut Jalapeno stuffed with seaweed salad and cream cheese. Deep fried in tempura style.

items.title: Grill Black Pepper Tuna
items.description: Light Torched Fresh Tuna covered with black pepper and sesame.

items.title: Salmon Tartare
items.description: Prepared with fresh raw salmon and seasonings mixed with avocado on top of fresh cucumber.

items.title: Spicy Tuna Bite
items.japanese_title: スパイシーマグロバイト
items.description: Fresh avocado slices, and a dollop of spicy ahi tuna with a slice of jalapeno on top of crispy sushi rice bread.

soup_salad.japanese_title: シェアして楽しめる前菜

items.title: House Green Salad
items.japanese_title: ハウスグリーンサラダ
items.description: Choice of Japanese ginger dressing of spicy ranch.

items.title: Wakame
items.description: Japanese-style Seaweed Salad with homemade dressing.

items.title: Spicy Kani Salad
items.description: Japanese version of crab salad made with thin crab sticks and julienned crunchy vegetables, dressed with a spicy mayonnaise.

items.title: Chuka Ika Sansai
items.description: Taste of the ocean, a Japanese style calamari salad with some fresh ingredients and vignate dressing.

items.title: Miso Soup
items.description: A traditional Japanese soup consisting of a dashi stock into which softened miso paste is mixed.

items.title: Kombu and Shiitake Dashi
items.description: Shiitake mushrooms and kombu seaweed bring you the earth and sea in one bowl.

items.title: Vegetable Tempura
items.description: Variety of fresh vegetables in tempura bread come with house made dipping sauce.

items.title: Shrimp Tempura
items.description: Fresh breaded tiger shrimp with house made tempura dressing.

items.title: Kani Tempura
items.description: Japanese deep-fried sushi crab sticks dipped in light and crispy batter, deep fried to golden color.

items.title: Chicken Katsu
items.description: Japanese-style fried chicken cutlet coated with crispy panko, perfect with steam rice and special katsu sauce.

items.title: Crispy Fish Katsu
items.description: Fresh Cod cut in individual bite size deep fried til golden crispy.

sushi.description: (2 pieces per order) Bed Rice top with fresh ingredients

items.description: Shrimp Tempura cucumber tapped with lobster salad topped spicy mayo, eel sauce and tobiko

items.title: Crunchy Eel Roll
items.description: Tempura flakes, avocado, crab meat, topped with whole roasted eel

items.title: Fire Island Roll
items.description: Crunchy Spicy salmon inside, topped with lobster salad and jalapeño

items.title: Dragon Roll
items.description: Eel cucumber topped with avocada eel sauce and tobiko

items.title: Rainbow Roll
items.description: California roll topped with tuna, salmon, and white fish

items.title: Dancing Tuna Roll
items.description: Crunchy spicy tuna and mango, spicy salmon on top

items.title: Spider Roll
items.description: Deep fried soft shell crab, cucumber, and avocado with eel sauce on top

items.title: Yummy Roll
items.description: Eel & avocado, mango topped with crunchy spicy tuna

items.title: Crazy Tuna Roll
items.description: Pepper Tuna and avocado inside topped with spicy tuna

items.title: Crispy Roll
items.description: Smoked salmon, cream cheese, avocado deep fried whole roll, with eel sauce on top

items.title: Pink Lady Roll
items.description: Tuna salmon, yellowtail, avocado, cucumber, tobiko wrapped with soybean paper

items.title: Dynamite Roll
items.description: Crab, cream cheese and avocado deep fried and spicy crunchy tuna on top with spicy special sauce

items.title: Winter Roll
items.description: Tuna salmon, Yellowtail inside with spicy crab meat on the top

items.title: Godzilla Roll
items.description: Spicy tuna and crunch with avocado on the top

items.title: Crazy Mango Roll
items.description: Avocado, kani, topped with mango and mango sauce

items.title: Butterfly Roll
items.description: Lobster salad, mango, crunch avocado awith soybean paper and mango sauce

items.title: Negimaki
items.description: Scallions wrapped with thinly sliced Wagyu Steak in a teriyaki sauce

items.title: Sashimi Sampler
items.description: Daily Chef's Choice of 5 Piece unique fresh pieces

items.title: Grill yuzu Scallop
items.description: The yuzu, as well as the sake, soy sauce, sesame seeds, and other seasonings on giant scallops
